regular.description: Use this token when you don't have a specific font style, but want to re-/apply both font-family and font-weight

anyWeight.description: Use, when you don't want to specify the font weight

25.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.06:1 against background #ffffff

50.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.13:1 against background #ffffff

100.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 1.3:1 against background #ffffff

350.description: Do not use for UI elements or text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 2.68:1 against background #ffffff

400.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 3.15:1 against background #ffffff

450.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 3.74:1 against background #ffffff

500.description: Color can be used for UI elements or large text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 4.48:1 against background #ffffff

550.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 5.41:1 against background #ffffff

600.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 6.48:1 against background #ffffff

900.description: Color can be used for small text. WCAG 2.x (relative luminance) contrast is 17.22:1 against background #ffffff

default.description: External focus effect. Works fine in most cases.

navigation.description: Focus style designed specifically for side navigation.

default.description: External selection effect. You can use it to highlight a selected object to make the selection more visible. E.g.: Avatar Group

smooth.description: Smooth timing function used in 0.3s animations

background.description: The general bacground for the main App container

anyWeight.description: Use, when you don't want to specify the font weight
